name: Burning Nightmare
description:
A nightmare fuel of strange creatures, and all you have is a flamethrower...

I don't know maybe use the flamethrower to get past the creatures and escape this nightmare?

3D model assets from - Quaternius • Free Game Assets

Music from - https://freepd.com/

IMPORTANT-

Web version is pretty bad compared to exe, the lighting on the in browser version basically ruins the atmosphere of the game, and changes a bunch of other small things, please keep this in mind.
